players.name: Alice
memory: Bob: "Based on the investigation, I believe Diana is the mafioso. Please consider this information."
Diana: "I'm with Bob, Diana seems suspicious"
Bob: "I'm continuing my investigation. So far, no new evidence points to Alice being the mafioso."
Diana: "I'm sticking to my belief that Diana is the mafioso. No new evidence has convinced me otherwise."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
